text_block_list.text:
For some reason, when I pushed the button for coffee, 
a sweet-looking drink came out of the vending machine.

Because of work, I was eating lunch later than usual. 
But luckily, I was still able to get the usual.

It had been a while since that really rainy day. The only thing I 
could think of was trying to figure out what 『Marvelous』 meant――

At night, when I was brushing my teeth, I would wonder if 
this was marvelous. In the morning, when deciding which 
sock to put on first, I'd wonder if this was marvelous.

Normally, you'd think I should be focusing on 
scouting an Uma Musume, but instead, I was 
desperately searching for the meaning of marvelous.

At this rate, my everday life would be destroyed 
by marvelous. Or was it already too late? I mean, 
it seemed like I could hear it right now――
Marvelous☆★☆
Ahahahaa☆ Were you surprised? Were you surprised?
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
It wasn't that I was surprised. I was worried that I 
was so far gone that I was marvelously hearing things!

Oh little lost lamb, how do you do☆? 
Can't find Marvelous? I'll just show you★
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
Marvelous, you see, is sparkly, exciting, derring-do☆ 
It's always there all around, just waiting for someone like you★
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
So c'mon, let's go☆ 
Allllll~ that's Marvelous, Trainer, it's time for a show!
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
Declaring that, Marvelous Sunday grabbed my arm and pulled 
me along. Her hands seemed particularly warm.

I couldn't say no to that, because I wanted 
to know the truth about 『Marvelous』, but――
Nature~! Laurel~! Ahahahaa, Marvelous!
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
C'mon, you're late……wait, huh? Aren't you that trainer from 
before? Ahaha, she caught you, huh? Good work~, I guess.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text:
Oh, guess I haven't introduced myself yet. I'm Nice Nature. Marvelous 
is my roommate, guess you could call it an inevitable relationship.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text:
I'm Sakura Laurel♪ Marve-chan's…… Hmmm~, I guess 
you could say friendly rival, something like that?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Ahahaa, inevitable rivals! Sounds fun~! 
It's like fate, so very Marvelous☆, isn't it!?
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
You see, Trainer, Nature and Laurel are really Marvelous! 
When they run, it's like zooooom, whooosh, and zip!
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
When they're on their own they're Marvelous, but when they're together, 
they're even more Marvelous! I'm sure Trainer can tell too!
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text: Wait wait, even if you say that, they can't tell with that.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text:
Wait…… something feels off here. 
Aren't you a bit more lively than usual?
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text:
I was looking forward to parallel training but…… Hmmmmm~? Marve-chan, 
are you hiding something from us? Like you're feeling off or――
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Not a bit~! Today, I'm very Marvelous☆ too, you know. If I can run 
with Laurel and Nature, it'll be mooore~ Marvelous★
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
When I mentioned that to Sakura Laurel and Nice Nature, 
it seemed like their expressions clouded a bit.

I see, so that's how it is, huh. ――In that case, Marve-chan, we'll 
hold off on today's training! Let's head to the infirmary, okay?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Eeeeeeh, why!? 
What about Marvelous? What about training~!?
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
Geez, I'm glad we realized it was a slight fever. 
If she did training like that, it would definitely get worse.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san too, thanks for coming with us. 
Marve-chan's always pushing herself like that.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Hmmmm~…… usually it doesn't get as bad as a fever. The current 
Marve-chan doesn't have a particularly weak constitution.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
It's just, when she was little she was often 
sick, so maybe that's related. She's so lively 
that she moves around alot so that could be it too.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
It's not that I don't understand how nice it is to be able to run around, 
but, it does worry me that she doesn't seem to know her limits……
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text:
But well, there's a Selection race soon after all. I guess we'll 
just hope she can find a trainer that's good at managing that.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text:
That was unexpected. From what I had seen so far of Marvelous Sunday, 
she was always cheerful and powerful. But if I think back on it――

The day I met her, she had suddenly collapsed 
due to exhaustion on the course. Seemed like 
it was true, that she was bad at putting on the brakes.

I was captivated by her cheerful laugh while running, maybe that 
was why I was so interested in the meaning of 『Marvelous』.

However, for her 『Marvelous』 seemed to have some kind of 
meaning that made her pursue it to the detriment of her health.

I was confused by the large gap between her 
energetic appearance whenever she said 『Marvelous!』 
and her current state of laying passed out in bed.

She said she'd show me what marvelous meant. 
When she's better, I'll ask her directly what it means.
(……Ah, again……it's that dream……)
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text: (It's cold……and dark……)
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text: Mama…… Papa……?
text_block_list.name: Young Marvelous

text_block_list.text:
(Around this time I……didn't have the 
strength to find what was marvelous……)
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text: ……Grandm-……
text_block_list.name: Young Marvelous
